DESCRIPTION: Award-winning fine dining featuring contemporary American cuisine with French influences
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: The Golden Spoon represents the pinnacle of fine dining in San Francisco. Executive Chef Marcus Beaumont brings 20 years of Michelin-starred experience to create innovative dishes that celebrate seasonal ingredients and culinary artistry. Our intimate dining room provides the perfect setting for special occasions and memorable evenings.
MENU_DESCRIPTION_1: Muscovy duck breast with cherry gastrique, wild mushroom risotto, and micro greens
MENU_DESCRIPTION_2: Pan-seared halibut with cauliflower purée, pancetta, and lemon-caper beurre blanc
MENU_DESCRIPTION_3: Prime cut with truffle potato gratin, roasted bone marrow, and red wine reduction
MENU_DESCRIPTION_4: Chef's seven-course seasonal tasting menu with wine pairings available
APPETIZER_1_DESCRIPTION: Hudson Valley foie gras with cherry compote and brioche toast
APPETIZER_2_DESCRIPTION: Pacific oysters with spinach, herbs, and Pernod cream
APPETIZER_3_DESCRIPTION: Yellowfin tuna with avocado, sesame, and wasabi aioli
APPETIZER_4_DESCRIPTION: Maine lobster bisque with cognac and crème fraîche
SOUP_1_DESCRIPTION: Roasted butternut squash with truffle oil and chestnut foam
SOUP_2_DESCRIPTION: Classic French onion soup with Gruyère and herb croutons
SALAD_1_DESCRIPTION: Little gem lettuce with anchovy dressing and parmesan crisp
SALAD_2_DESCRIPTION: Roasted beets with burrata, pistachios, and aged balsamic
MAIN_1_DESCRIPTION: 28-day aged ribeye with bone marrow butter and seasonal vegetables
MAIN_2_DESCRIPTION: Pan-roasted John Dory with fennel confit and saffron beurre blanc
MAIN_3_DESCRIPTION: Herb-crusted lamb with ratatouille and red wine jus
MAIN_4_DESCRIPTION: Arborio rice with porcini, truffle oil, and aged Parmigiano
DESSERT_1_DESCRIPTION: Valrhona chocolate soufflé with vanilla bean ice cream
DESSERT_2_DESCRIPTION: Madagascar vanilla custard with caramelized sugar
DESSERT_3_DESCRIPTION: Meyer lemon curd with almond shortbread and raspberry
DESSERT_4_DESCRIPTION: Fresh seasonal fruits with pastry cream and almond crust
MAIN_5_DESCRIPTION: Free-range chicken with herb butter and root vegetables
MAIN_6_DESCRIPTION: Seasonal vegetable composition with grains and legumes
WINE_1_DESCRIPTION: Sonoma Coast, crisp with notes of apple and oak
WINE_2_DESCRIPTION: Russian River Valley, light-bodied with cherry notes
WINE_3_DESCRIPTION: Napa Valley, full-bodied with dark fruit and tannins
COCKTAIL_1_DESCRIPTION: Premium gin, dry vermouth, lemon twist
